Description: Tradition. Legacy. Performance. The 2018 Les Paul Traditional is an incredible throwback to the historic Les Pauls of yesteryear. A 50s style rounded neck profile and old-school cosmetic appointments make the Traditional a go to for, well, traditionalists! Premium maple tops and premium finishes pay homage to the great bursts of the late 1950s while the Burstbucker pickups give you vintage Gibson tone with modern clarity. Of course, the feel is instantly comfortable for Les Paul fanatics, too! We have no doubt that these will be extremely popular with both Les Paul lovers and newcomers alike. The 2018 Les Paul Traditional is a love letter to fans of the original bursts, and a tribute to the iconic heritage of the Les Paul Standard. We couldnt be happier to showcase it for our exceptional customers. Condition of Instrument This Les Paul Traditional is in excellent condition with minimal signs of use. Includes the original hardshell case. Title: Used 2018 Gibson Les Paul Traditional
